message: Let's be fair, Bob. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor to start. It benefits us both to settle quickly.
Your 60/40 split was too greedy, Alice. How about a 55/45 split in my favor?  The money is losing value fast, so let's make a deal.
Bob, let's be realistic. Your offer was worse for me than round 1! I'm proposing 56/44. Time is running out for both of us.
Alice, this is getting us nowhere. I'm moving closer to your offer, but I need a larger share. 52/48 is my final offer.
Bob, we're running out of time. I'm willing to compromise, but I need a larger share.  54/46 is my final offer.
